items.title: Official 2025 Guitar Center Black Friday ad arrives: Deals now live at up to 40% off
items.summary:
The nation-wide music shop’s early deals already went up, but the official Guitar Center Black Friday sale is now live. Delivering up to 40% off everything from actual instruments to gear to upgrade your home studio, and accessories for all of it, the official Guitar Center Black Friday sale is now live from now through Cyber Monday. Head below for more details and to browse through the official Black Friday ad.

items.title: George Lucas’ narrative art museum opens next year in LA
items.summary: The Lucas Museum of Narrative Art has been over a decade in the making, but its opening day is finally in sight. It’s officially less than a year away on September 22nd, 2026. The museum will include over 40,000 works of “narrative art,” ranging from murals to comic book art and, of course, cinematic artifacts. […]

items.title: Tanzania president names new prime minister after disputed election
items.summary: (Reuters) -Tanzania's leader chose a longtime loyalist as prime minister on Thursday, after a disputed presidential election in the East African country prompted clashes in which rights groups say hundreds of protesters were killed. Read full story

items.title: The best Christmas gifts under $50
items.summary: One of the easiest things to do during the holidays is spend too much money. It happens to many of us, even when we swear that things are going to be different this year. We want to help you stay true to your intentions to save money when possible, and we're doing that with a […]

items.title: The company at the heart of the AI bubble
items.summary: So a lot of people think AI is a bubble. That includes OpenAI CEO Sam Altman, who keeps saying AI is a bubble all while raising and spending enormous amounts of money in ways that seem like bubble indicators to everyone else. This is all pretty confusing. So we sent Verge senior reporter Liz Lopatto […]

items.title: Steal this 5-pack of LISEN’s up to 10-foot braided USB-C cables at just $8 today ($1.50 each)
items.summary:
LISEN Braided USB-C Cables (5-pack)

Buy for $8 (Reg. Up to $12)

Enter promo code Q43FHXKQ to see the discounted price.

What we love

This braided USB-C cable 5-pack includes two 3.3-foot, two 6.6-foot, and one 10-foot cord for just under $8. That works out to about $1.50 apiece – a solid deal for braided USB-C cables, especially with a 10-foot option in the mix. It’s never a bad time to stock up on cables, and this deal offers a particularly good price.

items.title: EU launches antitrust probe into how Google’s anti-spam policy affects publishers’ search rankings
items.summary: The Commission said on Thursday that it had identified that Google is using its spam policy to push news media and other publishers' websites and content lower in search rankings when they include content from third parties.

items.title: Hop on any of these five Navee e-scooters with up to $195 exclusive savings starting from $340 (Reg. $480+)
items.summary:
We’ve secured a collection of exclusive deals from Wellbots on five Navee e-scooters, with all but one dropping to new low prices while these savings last. While it may not be falling to a new low like its counterparts, you’ll still be scoring the best current price on the Navee ST3 Pro Electric Scooter for $749.99 shipped, after using the exclusive code 9TO5NAV100 at checkout for an additional $100 off. While it carries a $950 MSRP directly from the brand, its starting off here at $850. We have seen it go as low as $660 once during July’s Prime Day event, but that rate hasn’t been seen since. This deal shaves $100 off the going rate ($200 total savings from the MSRP) for the best price we can currently find. Head below to learn more about it and the other four offers we’ve secured for our readers.

Mia Sato / The Verge:
Google launches AI-powered shopping features in the US, including conversational search, side-by-side item comparisons, price tracking, and AI-assisted checkout  —  There have never been more options for things to buy.  Google is betting AI is how shoppers will make decisions.

items.title: Switch 2 game deals: Donkey Kong Bananza, Zelda Switch 2 Editions, Mario Party, more
items.summary:
Nintendo has now officially revealed its upcoming Black Friday 2025 deals and we are in for up to 50% off a series of Switch games. While you might want to hold off on any first-party Nintendo Switch titles as of right now (or at least of the titles mentioned in the official announcement), there are no Switch 2 games getting “official” price drops this year, as expected. That leaves the current slate of Switch 2 titles on sale at Woot right now at some notable prices, and with some of them already selling out, it might be a good idea to jump in if you’re still looking to land a physical copy of the new Zelda Switch 2 editions, Mario Kart World, or DK Bananza:

  • Donkey Kong Bananza $62 (Reg. $70)
  • Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild – Switch 2 Edition $63 (Reg. $70)
  • Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom – Switch 2 Edition $70 (Reg. $80)
  • Mario Kart World $70 (Reg. $80)
  • Super Mario Party Jamboree – Switch 2 Edition + Jamboree TV $70 (Reg. $80)

items.summary:
Amazon has started dishing out early Black Friday deals on many of its devices, and it’s now offering a 4-pack of its eero Pro 6E mesh Wi-Fi system for $489.98 shipped. This is an $800 set, which is now seeing a 39% discount. Today’s deal shaves $310 off this 4-pack, marking the return of the 2025 low it recently hit ahead of the fall Prime Day sale. Notably, you’ll also find deals on single, dual, and triple-node systems at the moment with prices starting at $159.99 shipped, making this a great time to cash in and upgrade your home network. items.summary:

This newer model has only been on the Amazon marketplace for two months and normally runs $220 outside of discounts, of which we’ve seen the costs taken as low as $185 here, with Costco having had a one-time, short-lived cut to $125 with a membership back at the top of the month. Aside from that rate, you’re otherwise looking at the best price we have tracked and a new low price at Amazon, giving you $61 in savings while also upgrading your air frying game – especially with holiday feasts on the horizon.
